scripts.lint:backend: docker-compose run --rm -w /app/backend backend flake8 --config=.flake8 app tests
scripts.format:backend: docker-compose run --rm -w /app backend black backend/app backend/tests
scripts.fix:backend: npm run format:backend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.test:backend: docker-compose run --rm -e TEST_DATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:postgres@db:5432/heroleague_test -w /app backend bash -c 'flask --app backend/manage.py db upgrade && pytest -q --disable-warnings backend/tests'
scripts.db:init: docker-compose run --rm backend flask --app backend/manage.py db init
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose run --rm backend flask --app backend/manage.py db migrate -m "Auto migration"
scripts.db:upgrade: docker-compose run --rm backend flask --app backend/manage.py db upgrade
scripts.db:drop: docker-compose run --rm backend flask --app backend/manage.py drop-db
scripts.db:create: docker-compose run --rm backend flask --app backend/manage.py create-db
scripts.db:seed: docker-compose run --rm backend flask --app backend/manage.py seed-db
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose run --rm backend flask --app backend/manage.py reset-db
scripts.fix:frontend: npm run format:frontend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.fix: npm run fix:backend && npm run fix:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
